articles.title: President Joe Biden says US shutdown isn't his fault. Will Americans agree? | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The White House is aiming to shift blame for a potential government shutdown onto House Republicans as the deadline approaches. President Joe Biden and his advisers are hoping that the rest of the country will see the GOP as responsible for the funding packag…
